meanings: [명사] worry, concern, care, anxiety, apprehension, fear, [동사] worry (about), be concerned[worried, anxious] (about), feel[be] uneasy (about)
A concern is a high and steep mountain

vlive.korean: [걱정] 태현이 어떡하냐? [Worried] but what about TAEHYUN? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
[걱정] 이거 얼마나 마셔야 되냐? [Worried] How much do I need to drink? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
vlive.english: [Worried] How much do I need to drink?

vlive.korean: 요즘에 또 폐렴 때문에 다들 걱정이 많으시죠? A lot of people are worried because of pneumonia, right? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU’EST REN] 안뇽🦋
vlive.english: A lot of people are worried because of pneumonia, right?

vlive.korean: [걱정 거리 투척] - 오.... - 좋다 - 그럼 걱정이 생긴다는 소리네요? [Trying to make him worry] - Oh! - That's good. - Means that you will worry? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU'EST] L.O.Λ.E STORY EP.19 뉴이스트의 2020 왁자지껄 운수대통 #1
vlive.english: [Trying to make him worry] - Oh! - That's good. - Means that you will worry?

vlive.korean: 뭔 소리죠? - 하나 걱정 하지 마 이렇게 나올 줄 알았는데 하나 걱정 진짜 뭐야 - 한국말이죠? What does that mean? - I thought you'd say "don't worry". - Was that even Korean? 듣기 View video BTS : [Full] BTS Comeback Special: '보'이는 '라'이브 '해'요
vlive.english: What does that mean? - I thought you'd say "don't worry". - Was that even Korean?

examples.korean: She was fearful that she would fail. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 실패할까 봐 걱정이 되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: They were making her feel obscurely worried. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 그녀를 왠지 모르게 걱정스럽게 만들었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
